title: Deployment - Physical-to-Virtual Migration
description: A project requires migrating an aging physical server to a virtual machine (P2V) on a new hypervisor.

tasks.description: Install a P2V conversion tool on the source physical server.
Run the conversion tool to create a virtual machine image of the physical server.
tasks.expected_outcome: A VMDK or VHDX file is successfully created.

tasks.description: Import the VM image into the new hypervisor, boot it up, and test for functionality.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new VM is online and operational, and the old physical server can be decommissioned.
